name: laravel-management-system
description: Laravel Management System with Employee, Attendance, and Reporting features

scripts.vercel-build: composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader && npm install && npm run build && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache
scripts.netlify-build: composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader && npm install && npm run build && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache
scripts.railway-build: composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader && npm install && npm run build && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache
